techmeme.title: MicroStrategy, Palantir, and Axon will join the Nasdaq 100 index, effective before the market open on December 23; Super Micro will be removed from the index (Tanaya Macheel/CNBC)
Sources: ServiceTitan's IPO brought big windfalls for early investors, including returns of $1B+ for Iconiq Growth and $800M+ for Bessemer Venture Partners (Katie Roof/Bloomberg)
During his NeurIPS talk, Ilya Sutskever says "Pre-training as we know it will end", as "we've achieved peak data and there'll be no more" (Kylie Robison/The Verge)
Suchir Balaji, a former OpenAI researcher who accused the company of copyright violations in October, was found dead by suicide on November 26 in San Francisco (Jakob Rodgers/Mercury News)
Letter: Meta urges California's AG to stop OpenAI's for-profit transition, says Musk is "qualified" to "represent the interests of Californians in this matter" (Wall Street Journal)
